$comment: This schema is used to validate dragon ability tag JSON files in the data/dmr/ability_tags directory. Each ability tag defines a collection of abilities that can be referenced as a group.
title: Dragon Ability Tag Schema
description: Schema for defining dragon ability tags that group multiple abilities together

ability.description: The ability or ability tag this entry refers to. If it starts with '#', it references another ability tag.

chance.description: The chance of a dragon getting this ability

abilities.description: List of abilities or ability tags in this tag, along with their chances of occurrence.
